UPW Train #32 Origin Change
UPW train #32, scheduled to depart Elburn at 7:25 AM, will originate at La Fox due to mechanical problems. Train #36 will accommodate passengers from Elburn.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
Metra will operate on reduced schedule on December 31

As a reminder, Metra will be operating on a reduced schedule on Wednesday, December 31 and will offer free rides on all trains arriving at or departing from Metra's downtown stations after 6pm New Year's Eve. Alcohol prohibited on all trains after 7pm.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW #2212 Will Not Operate

MDW #2212 scheduled to depart National Street at 6:34 AM, will not operate due to an operational incident. Trains #2216 and #2218 will accommodate passengers. Train #2216 will make an additional stop at Mannheim. Visit metratracker.com for train locations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPW Train #32 Delayed

UPW train #32 scheduled to arrive Ogilvie Transportation Center at 8:41 AM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to mechanical issues. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
Metra will operate on a Sunday/Holiday schedule on January 1
As a reminder, Metra will be operating on a Sunday/Holiday schedule on Thursday, January 1. Please visit metra.com for details.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Trains #2104 and #2105 Will Not Operate
MDN trains #2104 and #2105 will not operate due to mechanical problems. Trains #2106 and #2107 will accommodate passengers. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Metra Electric District Extra Service For Games at Soldier Field
The Metra Electric District will run extra train service for anticipation of larger than normal crowds for Chicago home games at Soldier Field
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN #2107 Will Operate a Normal Schedule (UPDATE)
MDN #2107 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 7:32 AM, will make its normal stops to Grayslake. Please disregard the previous alert stating it will make all stops to Fox Lake.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Train #2205 Delayed

MDW train #2205 scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 8:55 AM, is on the move and may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to mechanical problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St./Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID #602 delayed.
RID #602 Scheduled to arrive in Chicago at 6:47 am is currently operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier mechanical issue.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Entry Closed - Canopies Refurbished

Passengers will not have access to east station and east parking lot platform entry November 10 through winter 2026 at University Park while canopies are being refurbished. Passengers have full access to west station and west parking lot platform entry.
